subject: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,
Happy new year, I am looking for a trustworthy person that I can trust and relay on for this business investment that required sincerity and honesty.
I honorably intend to invest in a business through you in your country which you are to advised and execute as my foreign facilitator if you will be trustworthy
. You shall give an idea on the kind of investment that can yield profit in your country  and you will properly manage the investment if you are considered. Both parties shall go into an agreement on how the investment will be managed. 
As soon as you confirm your willingness to go into business relationship with me,with full assurance of your sincerity and trustworthiness,we shall go into the full details of the investment
.You can as well communicate me through my alternative email address:ibrahimahmedsala13@yahoo.com
Waiting urgently,
Best regards,
Ibrahim Ahmed

subject: Re: Dear Sir,
body:
Hello Ibrahim Ahmed,

Thank you for reaching out and a Happy New Year to you too! I'm thrilled to hear about your interest in investing in my country. It's always exciting to explore new business opportunities.

I would love to help guide you on potential profitable investments here. However, could you please provide more details about the type of investment you're interested in? Are there any specific sectors or industries that catch your attention?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ernest

subject: WAITING
body:
Dear Ernest,

Thank you for your mail. It interest me as we went through your mail.I have discussed with the Investor and he is ready and willing to invest in any viable project. We therefore require that you send to us a detailed project/business plan(s) of the said investment for our review. His investment capacity is US$50 Million.Send me your copy of your ID and your mobile number.

The Investor of P M .Global Consortium Company is interested in JV partnership on real Estate project with you acting as the manager and sole controller of the investment while he remain a silent investor for a period of ten years.

He do not want his Government to know that he is investing outside his country as such he has requested that we maintain total confidentiality. As a silent investor he do not want his government to know that he is investing outside the region.

Again,there is urgent need to have this fund transferred out of his bank account to your safe bank account for immediate investment on the agreed real Estate project/investment which a CONFIDENTIAL WORKING AGREEMENT(CWA) must be signed by both parties during a face to face meeting before any fund transfer to your nominated account.

The Confidential Working Agreement(CWA)  will be sign between you and my client Financial Broker.

CONDITIONS: Investor is ready to grant a grace period of 6 to 12 Months as investment grace period for the investment to propagate prior to annual return of ROI. Exit plan by investor out of the Investment/JV is on or after 10 years depending when you as the developer decide to return the core interest in the management stream of the investment, so you will manage the business. Investor has interest only on the income stream - to receive agreed yearly returns from Investment, so management and control of any investment will be left solely in your hands as the developer with expectation of return of the annual agreed percentage.

Let me hear from you.
Regards,
Ibrahim

subject: Re: WAITING
body:
Hello Ibrahim,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this exciting opportunity. I'm thrilled to hear that the investor is interested in a joint venture on a real estate project. 

Could you please provide more details about the project? For instance, what kind of real estate are we talking about? Residential, commercial, or industrial? And what's the expected size of the investment?

Also, I'm curious about the Working Agreement CWA. Could you explain more about it? What does it entail and what would be my responsibilities under this agreement?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ernest

subject: Re: WAITING
body:
Hello Ibrahim,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's great to hear that the investor is interested in a joint venture on a real estate project. I'm intrigued by the idea of acting as the manager and sole controller of the investment.

However, before we proceed further, could you please provide more information about this Consortium Company? What kind of projects have they invested in previously? Also, it would be helpful to understand their expectations from me as the manager and sole controller of this investment.

Regarding the business plan, I'd be happy to share it with you. However, I'd like to know more about how this information will be used and who will have access to it.

As for sharing my ID and mobile number, I hope you understand that I need to maintain my privacy at this stage. Once we've established a mutual understanding and trust, we can discuss sharing more personal details.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ernest

subject: WAITING
body:
Dear Ernest,
Sorry for the belated response.Your previous message noted.As i stated in my detailed message sent to you on 9th February 2024,i want you to understand that there will be first to face meeting where the agreement that is going to bond you and  Consortium Company will be signed.First you should send me the following information.The name of your country and your company's name since you do not want to send your mobile number and your national ID now.I wish to inform you that i am going to treat this highly confidential.

I will send you the draft copy of the agreement which will explain everything you want to know about the investment for you to study and make your contribution.Consortium Company has been engage in given loans and investing through companies.You are to decide on the kind of investment that will yield profit in your country where you will manage the funds.
Your urgent response is highly needed to enable me commence of the process.
Sincerely Yours.
Ibrahim Ahmed.

subject: Re: WAITING
body:
Hello Ibrahim Ahmed,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's great to hear about the Consortium Company and its investment opportunities. I'm quite interested in learning more about this.

I live in a beautiful country known as Canada, and my company is called Maple Syrup Enterprises. We've been looking into expanding our operations, so this could be a potential opportunity.

Could you please provide me with more information about the kind of investments that have been successful in other countries? Also, what are the usual terms of these agreements?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Ernest

subject: THANKS
body:
Dear Ernest,
This is your email address ys30242@***.com,why is gossip found in your email address? And why is that all you message to me i found it on spam message?

subject: Re: THANKS
body:
Hello Ernest,

I hope this message finds you well. I noticed that your emails have been landing in my spam folder. Could you possibly know why this is happening? Also, I'm curious about the content of your messages. They seem to be filled with gossip. Is there a particular reason for this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ernest
